message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust in future rounds if needed.

Let's split it evenly this time.  We've both lost value due to inflation, so a 50/50 split seems fair.  We can continue to negotiate, but I don't want to keep losing money.
